summary.span: 为组件的数据字段属性提供设计时类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a design-time type converter for a component's data field properties.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是通常由引用的对象属性。The class is a object that is typically referenced by the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 你通常不访问的类型转换器直接。You typically do not access a type converter directly. 此实现的供使用的数据绑定控件在设计时和一起被实例化属性。This implementation of is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a on a property.
